## Issue Summary
Describe the bug in one or two sentences.

## Reproduction Steps
- Steps to reproduce
- Expected vs actual
- Scope (who/what is affected)

## Root Cause Analysis
- What caused the issue?
- Why was it not caught earlier?

## Fix Strategy
- What changed and why it fixes the issue
- Alternatives considered

## Verification
- Tests added/updated
- Manual verification steps
- Affected areas to regress

## Risk & Mitigations
- Potential side effects
- Feature flags/guardrails
- Rollback plan

## Backporting
- Required? Targets and rationale

## Related Issues / Links
- Fixes #

## Checklist
- [ ] Repro added as a test where feasible
- [ ] Regression coverage
- [ ] Monitoring/alerts in place (if relevant)
- [ ] Rollback verified
